titles.title: Virgin Islands Energy Crisis Relief Act
To provide energy crisis relief to residents of the Virgin Islands.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E1875)

Referred to the Committee on Agriculture, and in addition to the Committees on Energy and Commerce, Transportation and Infrastructure, Financial Services, and Education and the Workforce, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
Referred to House Energy and Commerce
Referred to House Transportation and Infrastructure
Referred to House Education and the Workforce
Referred to the Subcommittee on Economic Development, Public Buildings and Emergency Management.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Conservation, Energy, and Forestry.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Insurance, Housing and Community Opportunity.

committee.name: House Transportation and Infrastructure
committee.subcommittee: Economic Development, Public Buildings and Emergency Management

term.name: Energy assistance for the poor and aged
